content: ***free in honor of the warm the line project 1 *** ***$5 of each pattern purchased when this was a paid pattern was donated split between planned parenthood and national network of abortion funds it is now free for use please make one for yourself and all your friends *** inspired by the green bandanas and handkerchiefs i ve seen throughout the world at abortion access protests starting almost 20 years ago in argentina the autonomy cowl pattern was designed to help raise funds for groups making full reproductive healthcare more available to all there are lots of wonderful dyers who have green yarns available for this cowl and i ll be showing some of them in my instagram stories and on my grid the dk version takes only about 100-110 yards of yarn and the fingering weight pattern hack takes about 150 yards there is charted patterning and also directions on omitting the patterning for a plain cowl if desired any shade of green that fits your personality is perfect thank you for knitting my patterns and supporting indie pattern design subscribe to my newsletter here 2 and get 15% off your first pattern order find me on instagram at @romidesigns 3 and on youtube here 4 come by
